title: What are some of the best renewable energy blogs? - Quora

response.answer_text: My favorites were chosen from my research: Alternative Energy ProCon.org- a nonprofit website that presents research, studies, questions related to alternative energy and fossil fuels.The Guardian: Latest news on Renewal Energy from News, sport, and opinion from the Guardian's US edition | The Guardian, the world's leading liberal voice.The Renewable Energy Hub Blog Essential articles and recent news events related to the Renewable Energy Industry. Renewable Energy Hub is a national organization that sells and promotes green energy equipment and services.Phoenix Energy Group is a renewable energy supplier in New York which helps business owners reduce energy cost and gives control of energy supply rates. Their blog includes articles about renewable energy.P.s. These websites are also recommended by Feedspot and are included on 75 Renewable Energy Blogs, Websites & Newsletters from all over the world.

Hello Aranab, That depends on your personality. If are high in openness, then you would be well served to step out of the echo chambers and take the time to understand why many people are critical of the popular renewable message. May I recommend: A Chemist in Langleyhttps://www.titansofnuclear.com/QuoraI encourage you to use Quora to test your ideas. The very best thing you can do to organize your thinking is writing; do write as much as you can. If you are shy or uncertain about your writing skills, then gain experience by posting anonymously. Regards, APDahlen
